main_definition: Elevation refers to the act of raising or lifting something, a position above a lower level, or an increase in height.

meanings_and_examples.definition: The process of increasing altitude or height
meanings_and_examples.example: Hiking up the mountain brought us to various elevations.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A numerical value representing the distance above a fixed reference point, such as sea level
meanings_and_examples.example: Mount Everest has an elevation of 29,032 feet (8,848 meters) above sea level.

meanings_and_examples.definition: An increase in status or position
meanings_and_examples.example: She experienced a significant elevation in her career when she was promoted to manager.
